transcript: humility is stupid because if you look it up on Google it says thinking less of oneself this is why looking and defining terms is important because if you look at Merriam-Webster for example it's lack of Pride or arrogance I don't think people would say you wouldn't want that I'm like I think people are okay not being prideful arrogant but even more so and the definition that I have taken on is actually the exact opposite of that it is not decreasing your regard for self but increasing your regard for others I thought that posturing when I was younger was the thing that would get people to like me what I realized later was that you gain status by giving more to the group than you get
